00012 #ifndef __AUDACITY_EFFECT_TWOPASSSIMPLEMONO__
00013 #define __AUDACITY_EFFECT_TWOPASSSIMPLEMONO__
00014 
00015 #include "SimpleMono.h"
00016 
00017 class WaveTrack;
00018 
00019 class EffectTwoPassSimpleMono:public Effect {
00020 
00021  public:
00022    virtual bool Process();
00023 
00024  private:
00025    bool ProcessOne(WaveTrack * t,
00026                    sampleCount start, sampleCount end);
00027    bool ProcessPass();
00028 
00029  protected:  
00030 
00031    // Override these methods if you need to initialize something
00032    // before each pass. Return None if processing should stop.
00033    // These should not depend on mOutputTracks having been set up via CopyInputTracks().
00034    virtual bool InitPass1();
00035    virtual bool InitPass2();
00036    
00037    // Override these methods if you need to do things
00038    // before every track (including the first one)
00039    virtual bool NewTrackPass1();
00040    virtual bool NewTrackPass2();
00041 
00042    // Override this method to actually process audio
00043    virtual bool ProcessPass1(float *buffer, sampleCount len) { return false; }
00044    virtual bool ProcessPass2(float *buffer, sampleCount len) { return false; }
00045    
00046    // Override this method to actually process audio with access to 2 sequential buffers at a time
00047    // Either buffer1 or buffer2 may be modified as needed
00048    // This allows implementation of processing with delays
00049    // The default just calls the one-buffer-at-a-time method
00050    virtual bool TwoBufferProcessPass1(float *buffer1, sampleCount len1, float *buffer2, sampleCount len2)
00051    { if(buffer1 != NULL) return ProcessPass1(buffer1, len1); else return true; }
00052    virtual bool TwoBufferProcessPass2(float *buffer1, sampleCount len1, float *buffer2, sampleCount len2)
00053    { if(buffer1 != NULL) return ProcessPass2(buffer1, len1); else return true; }
00054 
00055    // Call this if you know in advance that no second pass will be needed.
00056    // This is used as a hint for the progress bar
00057    void DisableSecondPass() { mSecondPassDisabled = true; }
00058 
00059    // Other useful information
00060    int    mCurTrackNum;
00061    double mCurRate;
00062    double mCurT0;
00063    double mCurT1;
00064    int    mCurChannel;
00065    int    mPass;
00066    bool   mSecondPassDisabled;
00067 
00068 };
